alif-lam-meem
al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa al-ḥayu al-qayūmu
nazzala ʿalayka al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi muṣaddiqan limā bayna yadayhi wa-anzala al-tawrāta wal-injīla
min qablu hudan lilnnāsi wa-anzala al-fur'qāna inna alladhīna kafarū biāyāti al-lahi lahum ʿadhābun shadīdun wal-lahu ʿazīzun dhū intiqāmin
inna al-laha lā yakhfā ʿalayhi shayon fī al-arḍi walā fī al-samāi
huwa alladhī yuṣawwirukum fī al-arḥāmi kayfa yashāu lā ilāha illā huwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu

huwa alladhī anzala ʿalayka al-kitāba min'hu āyātun muḥ'kamātun hunna ummu al-kitābi wa-ukharu mutashābihātun fa-ammā alladhīna fī qulūbihim zayghun fayattabiʿūna mā tashābaha min'hu ib'tighāa al-fit'nati wa-ib'tighāa tawīlihi wamā yaʿlamu tawīlahu illā al-lahu wal-rāsikhūna fī al-ʿil'mi yaqūlūna āmannā bihi kullun min ʿindi rabbinā wamā yadhakkaru illā ulū al-albābi
rabbanā lā tuzigh qulūbanā baʿda idh hadaytanā wahab lanā min ladunka raḥmatan innaka anta al-wahābu
rabbanā innaka jāmiʿu al-nāsi liyawmin lā rayba fīhi inna al-laha lā yukh'lifu al-mīʿāda
inna alladhīna kafarū lan tugh'niya ʿanhum amwāluhum walā awlāduhum mina al-lahi shayan wa-ulāika hum waqūdu al-nāri
kadabi āli fir'ʿawna wa-alladhīna min qablihim kadhabū biāyātinā fa-akhadhahumu al-lahu bidhunūbihim wal-lahu shadīdu al-ʿiqābi
qul lilladhīna kafarū satugh'labūna watuḥ'sharūna ilā jahannama wabi'sa al-mihādu

qad kāna lakum āyatun fī fi-atayni al-taqatā fi-atun tuqātilu fī sabīli al-lahi wa-ukh'rā kāfiratun yarawnahum mith'layhim raya al-ʿayni wal-lahu yu-ayyidu binaṣrihi man yashāu inna fī dhālika laʿib'ratan li-ulī al-abṣāri

zuyyina lilnnāsi ḥubbu al-shahawāti mina al-nisāi wal-banīna wal-qanāṭīri al-muqanṭarati mina al-dhahabi wal-fiḍati wal-khayli al-musawamati wal-anʿāmi wal-ḥarthi dhālika matāʿu al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wal-lahu ʿindahu ḥus'nu al-maābi

qul a-unabbi-ukum bikhayrin min dhālikum lilladhīna ittaqaw ʿinda rabbihim jannātun tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā wa-azwājun muṭahharatun wariḍ'wānun mina al-lahi wal-lahu baṣīrun bil-ʿibādi
alladhīna yaqūlūna rabbanā innanā āmannā fa-igh'fir lanā dhunūbanā waqinā ʿadhāba al-nāri
al-ṣābirīna wal-ṣādiqīna wal-qānitīna wal-munfiqīna wal-mus'taghfirīna bil-asḥāri
shahida al-lahu annahu lā ilāha illā huwa wal-malāikatu wa-ulū al-ʿil'mi qāiman bil-qis'ṭi lā ilāha illā huwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
inna al-dīna ʿinda al-lahi al-is'lāmu wamā ikh'talafa alladhīna ūtū al-kitāba illā min baʿdi mā jāahumu al-ʿil'mu baghyan baynahum waman yakfur biāyāti al-lahi fa-inna al-laha sarīʿu al-ḥisābi

fa-in ḥājjūka faqul aslamtu wajhiya lillahi wamani ittabaʿani waqul lilladhīna ūtū al-kitāba wal-umiyīna a-aslamtum fa-in aslamū faqadi ih'tadaw wa-in tawallaw fa-innamā ʿalayka al-balāghu wal-lahu baṣīrun bil-ʿibādi
inna alladhīna yakfurūna biāyāti al-lahi wayaqtulūna al-nabiyīna bighayri ḥaqqin wayaqtulūna alladhīna yamurūna bil-qis'ṭi mina al-nāsi fabashir'hum biʿadhābin alīmin
ulāika alladhīna ḥabiṭat aʿmāluhum fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wamā lahum min nāṣirīna
alam tara ilā alladhīna ūtū naṣīban mina al-kitābi yud'ʿawna ilā kitābi al-lahi liyaḥkuma baynahum thumma yatawallā farīqun min'hum wahum muʿ'riḍūna
dhālika bi-annahum qālū lan tamassanā al-nāru illā ayyāman maʿdūdātin wagharrahum fī dīnihim mā kānū yaftarūna
fakayfa idhā jamaʿnāhum liyawmin lā rayba fīhi wawuffiyat kullu nafsin mā kasabat wahum lā yuẓ'lamūna
quli al-lahuma mālika al-mul'ki tu'tī al-mul'ka man tashāu watanziʿu al-mul'ka mimman tashāu watuʿizzu man tashāu watudhillu man tashāu biyadika al-khayru innaka ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
tūliju al-layla fī al-nahāri watūliju al-nahāra fī al-layli watukh'riju al-ḥaya mina al-mayiti watukh'riju al-mayita mina al-ḥayi watarzuqu man tashāu bighayri ḥisābin

lā yattakhidhi al-mu'minūna al-kāfirīna awliyāa min dūni al-mu'minīna waman yafʿal dhālika falaysa mina al-lahi fī shayin illā an tattaqū min'hum tuqātan wayuḥadhirukumu al-lahu nafsahu wa-ilā al-lahi al-maṣīru
qul in tukh'fū mā fī ṣudūrikum aw tub'dūhu yaʿlamhu al-lahu wayaʿlamu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
yawma tajidu kullu nafsin mā ʿamilat min khayrin muḥ'ḍaran wamā ʿamilat min sūin tawaddu law anna baynahā wabaynahu amadan baʿīdan wayuḥadhirukumu al-lahu nafsahu wal-lahu raūfun bil-ʿibādi
qul in kuntum tuḥibbūna al-laha fa-ittabiʿūnī yuḥ'bib'kumu al-lahu wayaghfir lakum dhunūbakum wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
qul aṭīʿū al-laha wal-rasūla fa-in tawallaw fa-inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu al-kāfirīna
inna al-laha iṣ'ṭafā ādama wanūḥan waāla ib'rāhīma waāla ʿim'rāna ʿalā al-ʿālamīna
dhurriyyatan baʿḍuhā min baʿḍin wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
idh qālati im'ra-atu ʿim'rāna rabbi innī nadhartu laka mā fī baṭnī muḥarraran fataqabbal minnī innaka anta al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu

falammā waḍaʿathā qālat rabbi innī waḍaʿtuhā unthā wal-lahu aʿlamu bimā waḍaʿat walaysa al-dhakaru kal-unthā wa-innī sammaytuhā maryama wa-innī uʿīdhuhā bika wadhurriyyatahā mina al-shayṭāni al-rajīmi

fataqabbalahā rabbuhā biqabūlin ḥasanin wa-anbatahā nabātan ḥasanan wakaffalahā zakariyyā kullamā dakhala ʿalayhā zakariyyā al-miḥ'rāba wajada ʿindahā riz'qan qāla yāmaryamu annā laki hādhā qālat huwa min ʿindi al-lahi inna al-laha yarzuqu man yashāu bighayri ḥisābin
hunālika daʿā zakariyyā rabbahu qāla rabbi hab lī min ladunka dhurriyyatan ṭayyibatan innaka samīʿu al-duʿāi
fanādathu al-malāikatu wahuwa qāimun yuṣallī fī al-miḥ'rābi anna al-laha yubashiruka biyaḥyā muṣaddiqan bikalimatin mina al-lahi wasayyidan waḥaṣūran wanabiyyan mina al-ṣāliḥīna
qāla rabbi annā yakūnu lī ghulāmun waqad balaghaniya al-kibaru wa-im'ra-atī ʿāqirun qāla kadhālika al-lahu yafʿalu mā yashāu
qāla rabbi ij'ʿal lī āyatan qāla āyatuka allā tukallima al-nāsa thalāthata ayyāmin illā ramzan wa-udh'kur rabbaka kathīran wasabbiḥ bil-ʿashiyi wal-ib'kāri
wa-idh qālati al-malāikatu yāmaryamu inna al-laha iṣ'ṭafāki waṭahharaki wa-iṣ'ṭafāki ʿalā nisāi al-ʿālamīna
yāmaryamu uq'nutī lirabbiki wa-us'judī wa-ir'kaʿī maʿa al-rākiʿīna
dhālika min anbāi al-ghaybi nūḥīhi ilayka wamā kunta ladayhim idh yul'qūna aqlāmahum ayyuhum yakfulu maryama wamā kunta ladayhim idh yakhtaṣimūna
idh qālati al-malāikatu yāmaryamu inna al-laha yubashiruki bikalimatin min'hu us'muhu al-masīḥu ʿīsā ub'nu maryama wajīhan fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wamina al-muqarabīna
wayukallimu al-nāsa fī al-mahdi wakahlan wamina al-ṣāliḥīna
qālat rabbi annā yakūnu lī waladun walam yamsasnī basharun qāla kadhāliki al-lahu yakhluqu mā yashāu idhā qaḍā amran fa-innamā yaqūlu lahu kun fayakūnu
wayuʿallimuhu al-kitāba wal-ḥik'mata wal-tawrāta wal-injīla

warasūlan ilā banī is'rāīla annī qad ji'tukum biāyatin min rabbikum annī akhluqu lakum mina al-ṭīni kahayati al-ṭayri fa-anfukhu fīhi fayakūnu ṭayran bi-idh'ni al-lahi wa-ub'ri-u al-akmaha wal-abraṣa wa-uḥ'yī al-mawtā bi-idh'ni al-lahi wa-unabbi-ukum bimā takulūna wamā taddakhirūna fī buyūtikum inna fī dhālika laāyatan lakum in kuntum mu'minīna
wamuṣaddiqan limā bayna yadayya mina al-tawrāti wali-uḥilla lakum baʿḍa alladhī ḥurrima ʿalaykum waji'tukum biāyatin min rabbikum fa-ittaqū al-laha wa-aṭīʿūni
inna al-laha rabbī warabbukum fa-uʿ'budūhu hādhā ṣirāṭun mus'taqīmun
falammā aḥassa ʿīsā min'humu al-kuf'ra qāla man anṣārī ilā al-lahi qāla al-ḥawāriyūna naḥnu anṣāru al-lahi āmannā bil-lahi wa-ish'had bi-annā mus'limūna
rabbanā āmannā bimā anzalta wa-ittabaʿnā al-rasūla fa-uk'tub'nā maʿa al-shāhidīna
wamakarū wamakara al-lahu wal-lahu khayru al-mākirīna

idh qāla al-lahu yāʿīsā innī mutawaffīka warāfiʿuka ilayya wamuṭahhiruka mina alladhīna kafarū wajāʿilu alladhīna ittabaʿūka fawqa alladhīna kafarū ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati thumma ilayya marjiʿukum fa-aḥkumu baynakum fīmā kuntum fīhi takhtalifūna
fa-ammā alladhīna kafarū fa-uʿadhibuhum ʿadhāban shadīdan fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wamā lahum min nāṣirīna
wa-ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fayuwaffīhim ujūrahum wal-lahu lā yuḥibbu al-ẓālimīna
dhālika natlūhu ʿalayka mina al-āyāti wal-dhik'ri al-ḥakīmi
inna mathala ʿīsā ʿinda al-lahi kamathali ādama khalaqahu min turābin thumma qāla lahu kun fayakūnu
al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takun mina al-mum'tarīna
faman ḥājjaka fīhi min baʿdi mā jāaka mina al-ʿil'mi faqul taʿālaw nadʿu abnāanā wa-abnāakum wanisāanā wanisāakum wa-anfusanā wa-anfusakum thumma nabtahil fanajʿal laʿnata al-lahi ʿalā al-kādhibīna
inna hādhā lahuwa al-qaṣaṣu al-ḥaqu wamā min ilāhin illā al-lahu wa-inna al-laha lahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
fa-in tawallaw fa-inna al-laha ʿalīmun bil-muf'sidīna

qul yāahla al-kitābi taʿālaw ilā kalimatin sawāin baynanā wabaynakum allā naʿbuda illā al-laha walā nush'rika bihi shayan walā yattakhidha baʿḍunā baʿḍan arbāban min dūni al-lahi fa-in tawallaw faqūlū ish'hadū bi-annā mus'limūna
yāahla al-kitābi lima tuḥājjūna fī ib'rāhīma wamā unzilati al-tawrātu wal-injīlu illā min baʿdihi afalā taʿqilūna
hāantum hāulāi ḥājajtum fīmā lakum bihi ʿil'mun falima tuḥājjūna fīmā laysa lakum bihi ʿil'mun wal-lahu yaʿlamu wa-antum lā taʿlamūna
mā kāna ib'rāhīmu yahūdiyyan walā naṣrāniyyan walākin kāna ḥanīfan mus'liman wamā kāna mina al-mush'rikīna
inna awlā al-nāsi bi-ib'rāhīma lalladhīna ittabaʿūhu wahādhā al-nabiyu wa-alladhīna āmanū wal-lahu waliyyu al-mu'minīna
waddat ṭāifatun min ahli al-kitābi law yuḍillūnakum wamā yuḍillūna illā anfusahum wamā yashʿurūna
yāahla al-kitābi lima takfurūna biāyāti al-lahi wa-antum tashhadūna
yāahla al-kitābi lima talbisūna al-ḥaqa bil-bāṭili wataktumūna al-ḥaqa wa-antum taʿlamūna
waqālat ṭāifatun min ahli al-kitābi āminū bi-alladhī unzila ʿalā alladhīna āmanū wajha al-nahāri wa-uk'furū ākhirahu laʿallahum yarjiʿūna

walā tu'minū illā liman tabiʿa dīnakum qul inna al-hudā hudā al-lahi an yu'tā aḥadun mith'la mā ūtītum aw yuḥājjūkum ʿinda rabbikum qul inna al-faḍla biyadi al-lahi yu'tīhi man yashāu wal-lahu wāsiʿun ʿalīmun
yakhtaṣṣu biraḥmatihi man yashāu wal-lahu dhū al-faḍli al-ʿaẓīmi

wamin ahli al-kitābi man in tamanhu biqinṭārin yu-addihi ilayka wamin'hum man in tamanhu bidīnārin lā yu-addihi ilayka illā mā dum'ta ʿalayhi qāiman dhālika bi-annahum qālū laysa ʿalaynā fī al-umiyīna sabīlun wayaqūlūna ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba wahum yaʿlamūna
balā man awfā biʿahdihi wa-ittaqā fa-inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-mutaqīna

inna alladhīna yashtarūna biʿahdi al-lahi wa-aymānihim thamanan qalīlan ulāika lā khalāqa lahum fī al-ākhirati walā yukallimuhumu al-lahu walā yanẓuru ilayhim yawma al-qiyāmati walā yuzakkīhim walahum ʿadhābun alīmun

wa-inna min'hum lafarīqan yalwūna alsinatahum bil-kitābi litaḥsabūhu mina al-kitābi wamā huwa mina al-kitābi wayaqūlūna huwa min ʿindi al-lahi wamā huwa min ʿindi al-lahi wayaqūlūna ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba wahum yaʿlamūna

mā kāna libasharin an yu'tiyahu al-lahu al-kitāba wal-ḥuk'ma wal-nubuwata thumma yaqūla lilnnāsi kūnū ʿibādan lī min dūni al-lahi walākin kūnū rabbāniyyīna bimā kuntum tuʿallimūna al-kitāba wabimā kuntum tadrusūna
walā yamurakum an tattakhidhū al-malāikata wal-nabiyīna arbāban ayamurukum bil-kuf'ri baʿda idh antum mus'limūna

wa-idh akhadha al-lahu mīthāqa al-nabiyīna lamā ātaytukum min kitābin waḥik'matin thumma jāakum rasūlun muṣaddiqun limā maʿakum latu'minunna bihi walatanṣurunnahu qāla a-aqrartum wa-akhadhtum ʿalā dhālikum iṣ'rī qālū aqrarnā qāla fa-ish'hadū wa-anā maʿakum mina al-shāhidīna
faman tawallā baʿda dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
afaghayra dīni al-lahi yabghūna walahu aslama man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi ṭawʿan wakarhan wa-ilayhi yur'jaʿūna

qul āmannā bil-lahi wamā unzila ʿalaynā wamā unzila ʿalā ib'rāhīma wa-is'māʿīla wa-is'ḥāqa wayaʿqūba wal-asbāṭi wamā ūtiya mūsā waʿīsā wal-nabiyūna min rabbihim lā nufarriqu bayna aḥadin min'hum wanaḥnu lahu mus'limūna
waman yabtaghi ghayra al-is'lāmi dīnan falan yuq'bala min'hu wahuwa fī al-ākhirati mina al-khāsirīna
kayfa yahdī al-lahu qawman kafarū baʿda īmānihim washahidū anna al-rasūla ḥaqqun wajāahumu al-bayinātu wal-lahu lā yahdī al-qawma al-ẓālimīna
ulāika jazāuhum anna ʿalayhim laʿnata al-lahi wal-malāikati wal-nāsi ajmaʿīna
khālidīna fīhā lā yukhaffafu ʿanhumu al-ʿadhābu walā hum yunẓarūna
illā alladhīna tābū min baʿdi dhālika wa-aṣlaḥū fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
inna alladhīna kafarū baʿda īmānihim thumma iz'dādū kuf'ran lan tuq'bala tawbatuhum wa-ulāika humu al-ḍālūna
inna alladhīna kafarū wamātū wahum kuffārun falan yuq'bala min aḥadihim mil'u al-arḍi dhahaban walawi if'tadā bihi ulāika lahum ʿadhābun alīmun wamā lahum min nāṣirīna
lan tanālū al-bira ḥattā tunfiqū mimmā tuḥibbūna wamā tunfiqū min shayin fa-inna al-laha bihi ʿalīmun
kullu al-ṭaʿāmi kāna ḥillan libanī is'rāīla illā mā ḥarrama is'rāīlu ʿalā nafsihi min qabli an tunazzala al-tawrātu qul fatū bil-tawrāti fa-it'lūhā in kuntum ṣādiqīna
famani if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba min baʿdi dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ẓālimūna
qul ṣadaqa al-lahu fa-ittabiʿū millata ib'rāhīma ḥanīfan wamā kāna mina al-mush'rikīna
inna awwala baytin wuḍiʿa lilnnāsi lalladhī bibakkata mubārakan wahudan lil'ʿālamīna
fīhi āyātun bayyinātun maqāmu ib'rāhīma waman dakhalahu kāna āminan walillahi ʿalā al-nāsi ḥijju al-bayti mani is'taṭāʿa ilayhi sabīlan waman kafara fa-inna al-laha ghaniyyun ʿani al-ʿālamīna
qul yāahla al-kitābi lima takfurūna biāyāti al-lahi wal-lahu shahīdun ʿalā mā taʿmalūna
qul yāahla al-kitābi lima taṣuddūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi man āmana tabghūnahā ʿiwajan wa-antum shuhadāu wamā al-lahu bighāfilin ʿammā taʿmalūna
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū in tuṭīʿū farīqan mina alladhīna ūtū al-kitāba yaruddūkum baʿda īmānikum kāfirīna
wakayfa takfurūna wa-antum tut'lā ʿalaykum āyātu al-lahi wafīkum rasūluhu waman yaʿtaṣim bil-lahi faqad hudiya ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha ḥaqqa tuqātihi walā tamūtunna illā wa-antum mus'limūna

wa-iʿ'taṣimū biḥabli al-lahi jamīʿan walā tafarraqū wa-udh'kurū niʿ'mata al-lahi ʿalaykum idh kuntum aʿdāan fa-allafa bayna qulūbikum fa-aṣbaḥtum biniʿ'matihi ikh'wānan wakuntum ʿalā shafā ḥuf'ratin mina al-nāri fa-anqadhakum min'hā kadhālika yubayyinu al-lahu lakum āyātihi laʿallakum tahtadūna
waltakun minkum ummatun yadʿūna ilā al-khayri wayamurūna bil-maʿrūfi wayanhawna ʿani al-munkari wa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
walā takūnū ka-alladhīna tafarraqū wa-ikh'talafū min baʿdi mā jāahumu al-bayinātu wa-ulāika lahum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
yawma tabyaḍḍu wujūhun wataswaddu wujūhun fa-ammā alladhīna is'waddat wujūhuhum akafartum baʿda īmānikum fadhūqū al-ʿadhāba bimā kuntum takfurūna
wa-ammā alladhīna ib'yaḍḍat wujūhuhum fafī raḥmati al-lahi hum fīhā khālidūna
til'ka āyātu al-lahi natlūhā ʿalayka bil-ḥaqi wamā al-lahu yurīdu ẓul'man lil'ʿālamīna
walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru

kuntum khayra ummatin ukh'rijat lilnnāsi tamurūna bil-maʿrūfi watanhawna ʿani al-munkari watu'minūna bil-lahi walaw āmana ahlu al-kitābi lakāna khayran lahum min'humu al-mu'minūna wa-aktharuhumu al-fāsiqūna
lan yaḍurrūkum illā adhan wa-in yuqātilūkum yuwallūkumu al-adbāra thumma lā yunṣarūna

ḍuribat ʿalayhimu al-dhilatu ayna mā thuqifū illā biḥablin mina al-lahi waḥablin mina al-nāsi wabāū bighaḍabin mina al-lahi waḍuribat ʿalayhimu al-maskanatu dhālika bi-annahum kānū yakfurūna biāyāti al-lahi wayaqtulūna al-anbiyāa bighayri ḥaqqin dhālika bimā ʿaṣaw wakānū yaʿtadūna
laysū sawāan min ahli al-kitābi ummatun qāimatun yatlūna āyāti al-lahi ānāa al-layli wahum yasjudūna
yu'minūna bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri wayamurūna bil-maʿrūfi wayanhawna ʿani al-munkari wayusāriʿūna fī al-khayrāti wa-ulāika mina al-ṣāliḥīna
wamā yafʿalū min khayrin falan yuk'farūhu wal-lahu ʿalīmun bil-mutaqīna
inna alladhīna kafarū lan tugh'niya ʿanhum amwāluhum walā awlāduhum mina al-lahi shayan wa-ulāika aṣḥābu al-nāri hum fīhā khālidūna
mathalu mā yunfiqūna fī hādhihi al-ḥayati al-dun'yā kamathali rīḥin fīhā ṣirrun aṣābat ḥartha qawmin ẓalamū anfusahum fa-ahlakathu wamā ẓalamahumu al-lahu walākin anfusahum yaẓlimūna

yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā tattakhidhū biṭānatan min dūnikum lā yalūnakum khabālan waddū mā ʿanittum qad badati al-baghḍāu min afwāhihim wamā tukh'fī ṣudūruhum akbaru qad bayyannā lakumu al-āyāti in kuntum taʿqilūna

hāantum ulāi tuḥibbūnahum walā yuḥibbūnakum watu'minūna bil-kitābi kullihi wa-idhā laqūkum qālū āmannā wa-idhā khalaw ʿaḍḍū ʿalaykumu al-anāmila mina al-ghayẓi qul mūtū bighayẓikum inna al-laha ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
in tamsaskum ḥasanatun tasu'hum wa-in tuṣib'kum sayyi-atun yafraḥū bihā wa-in taṣbirū watattaqū lā yaḍurrukum kayduhum shayan inna al-laha bimā yaʿmalūna muḥīṭun
wa-idh ghadawta min ahlika tubawwi-u al-mu'minīna maqāʿida lil'qitāli wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
idh hammat ṭāifatāni minkum an tafshalā wal-lahu waliyyuhumā waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
walaqad naṣarakumu al-lahu bibadrin wa-antum adhillatun fa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tashkurūna
idh taqūlu lil'mu'minīna alan yakfiyakum an yumiddakum rabbukum bithalāthati ālāfin mina al-malāikati munzalīna
balā in taṣbirū watattaqū wayatūkum min fawrihim hādhā yum'did'kum rabbukum bikhamsati ālāfin mina al-malāikati musawwimīna
wamā jaʿalahu al-lahu illā bush'rā lakum walitaṭma-inna qulūbukum bihi wamā al-naṣru illā min ʿindi al-lahi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥakīmi
liyaqṭaʿa ṭarafan mina alladhīna kafarū aw yakbitahum fayanqalibū khāibīna
laysa laka mina al-amri shayon aw yatūba ʿalayhim aw yuʿadhibahum fa-innahum ẓālimūna
walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi yaghfiru liman yashāu wayuʿadhibu man yashāu wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā takulū al-riba aḍʿāfan muḍāʿafatan wa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
wa-ittaqū al-nāra allatī uʿiddat lil'kāfirīna
wa-aṭīʿū al-laha wal-rasūla laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
wasāriʿū ilā maghfiratin min rabbikum wajannatin ʿarḍuhā al-samāwātu wal-arḍu uʿiddat lil'muttaqīna
alladhīna yunfiqūna fī al-sarāi wal-ḍarāi wal-kāẓimīna al-ghayẓa wal-ʿāfīna ʿani al-nāsi wal-lahu yuḥibbu al-muḥ'sinīna
wa-alladhīna idhā faʿalū fāḥishatan aw ẓalamū anfusahum dhakarū al-laha fa-is'taghfarū lidhunūbihim waman yaghfiru al-dhunūba illā al-lahu walam yuṣirrū ʿalā mā faʿalū wahum yaʿlamūna
ulāika jazāuhum maghfiratun min rabbihim wajannātun tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā waniʿ'ma ajru al-ʿāmilīna
qad khalat min qablikum sunanun fasīrū fī al-arḍi fa-unẓurū kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-mukadhibīna
hādhā bayānun lilnnāsi wahudan wamawʿiẓatun lil'muttaqīna
walā tahinū walā taḥzanū wa-antumu al-aʿlawna in kuntum mu'minīna
in yamsaskum qarḥun faqad massa al-qawma qarḥun mith'luhu watil'ka al-ayāmu nudāwiluhā bayna al-nāsi waliyaʿlama al-lahu alladhīna āmanū wayattakhidha minkum shuhadāa wal-lahu lā yuḥibbu al-ẓālimīna
waliyumaḥḥiṣa al-lahu alladhīna āmanū wayamḥaqa al-kāfirīna
am ḥasib'tum an tadkhulū al-janata walammā yaʿlami al-lahu alladhīna jāhadū minkum wayaʿlama al-ṣābirīna
walaqad kuntum tamannawna al-mawta min qabli an talqawhu faqad ra-aytumūhu wa-antum tanẓurūna
wamā muḥammadun illā rasūlun qad khalat min qablihi al-rusulu afa-in māta aw qutila inqalabtum ʿalā aʿqābikum waman yanqalib ʿalā ʿaqibayhi falan yaḍurra al-laha shayan wasayajzī al-lahu al-shākirīna
wamā kāna linafsin an tamūta illā bi-idh'ni al-lahi kitāban mu-ajjalan waman yurid thawāba al-dun'yā nu'tihi min'hā waman yurid thawāba al-ākhirati nu'tihi min'hā wasanajzī al-shākirīna
waka-ayyin min nabiyyin qātala maʿahu ribbiyyūna kathīrun famā wahanū limā aṣābahum fī sabīli al-lahi wamā ḍaʿufū wamā is'takānū wal-lahu yuḥibbu al-ṣābirīna
wamā kāna qawlahum illā an qālū rabbanā igh'fir lanā dhunūbanā wa-is'rāfanā fī amrinā wathabbit aqdāmanā wa-unṣur'nā ʿalā al-qawmi al-kāfirīna
faātāhumu al-lahu thawāba al-dun'yā waḥus'na thawābi al-ākhirati wal-lahu yuḥibbu al-muḥ'sinīna
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū in tuṭīʿū alladhīna kafarū yaruddūkum ʿalā aʿqābikum fatanqalibū khāsirīna
bali al-lahu mawlākum wahuwa khayru al-nāṣirīna
sanul'qī fī qulūbi alladhīna kafarū al-ruʿ'ba bimā ashrakū bil-lahi mā lam yunazzil bihi sul'ṭānan wamawāhumu al-nāru wabi'sa mathwā al-ẓālimīna

walaqad ṣadaqakumu al-lahu waʿdahu idh taḥussūnahum bi-idh'nihi ḥattā idhā fashil'tum watanāzaʿtum fī al-amri waʿaṣaytum min baʿdi mā arākum mā tuḥibbūna minkum man yurīdu al-dun'yā waminkum man yurīdu al-ākhirata thumma ṣarafakum ʿanhum liyabtaliyakum walaqad ʿafā ʿankum wal-lahu dhū faḍlin ʿalā al-mu'minīna
idh tuṣ'ʿidūna walā talwūna ʿalā aḥadin wal-rasūlu yadʿūkum fī ukh'rākum fa-athābakum ghamman bighammin likaylā taḥzanū ʿalā mā fātakum walā mā aṣābakum wal-lahu khabīrun bimā taʿmalūna

thumma anzala ʿalaykum min baʿdi al-ghami amanatan nuʿāsan yaghshā ṭāifatan minkum waṭāifatun qad ahammathum anfusuhum yaẓunnūna bil-lahi ghayra al-ḥaqi ẓanna al-jāhiliyati yaqūlūna hal lanā mina al-amri min shayin qul inna al-amra kullahu lillahi yukh'fūna fī anfusihim mā lā yub'dūna laka yaqūlūna law kāna lanā mina al-amri shayon mā qutil'nā hāhunā qul law kuntum fī buyūtikum labaraza alladhīna kutiba ʿalayhimu al-qatlu ilā maḍājiʿihim waliyabtaliya al-lahu mā fī ṣudūrikum waliyumaḥḥiṣa mā fī qulūbikum wal-lahu ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
inna alladhīna tawallaw minkum yawma al-taqā al-jamʿāni innamā is'tazallahumu al-shayṭānu bibaʿḍi mā kasabū walaqad ʿafā al-lahu ʿanhum inna al-laha ghafūrun ḥalīmun

yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā takūnū ka-alladhīna kafarū waqālū li-ikh'wānihim idhā ḍarabū fī al-arḍi aw kānū ghuzzan law kānū ʿindanā mā mātū wamā qutilū liyajʿala al-lahu dhālika ḥasratan fī qulūbihim wal-lahu yuḥ'yī wayumītu wal-lahu bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
wala-in qutil'tum fī sabīli al-lahi aw muttum lamaghfiratun mina al-lahi waraḥmatun khayrun mimmā yajmaʿūna
wala-in muttum aw qutil'tum la-ilā al-lahi tuḥ'sharūna

fabimā raḥmatin mina al-lahi linta lahum walaw kunta faẓẓan ghalīẓa al-qalbi la-infaḍḍū min ḥawlika fa-uʿ'fu ʿanhum wa-is'taghfir lahum washāwir'hum fī al-amri fa-idhā ʿazamta fatawakkal ʿalā al-lahi inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-mutawakilīna
in yanṣur'kumu al-lahu falā ghāliba lakum wa-in yakhdhul'kum faman dhā alladhī yanṣurukum min baʿdihi waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
wamā kāna linabiyyin an yaghulla waman yaghlul yati bimā ghalla yawma al-qiyāmati thumma tuwaffā kullu nafsin mā kasabat wahum lā yuẓ'lamūna
afamani ittabaʿa riḍ'wāna al-lahi kaman bāa bisakhaṭin mina al-lahi wamawāhu jahannamu wabi'sa al-maṣīru
hum darajātun ʿinda al-lahi wal-lahu baṣīrun bimā yaʿmalūna
laqad manna al-lahu ʿalā al-mu'minīna idh baʿatha fīhim rasūlan min anfusihim yatlū ʿalayhim āyātihi wayuzakkīhim wayuʿallimuhumu al-kitāba wal-ḥik'mata wa-in kānū min qablu lafī ḍalālin mubīnin
awalammā aṣābatkum muṣībatun qad aṣabtum mith'layhā qul'tum annā hādhā qul huwa min ʿindi anfusikum inna al-laha ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
wamā aṣābakum yawma al-taqā al-jamʿāni fabi-idh'ni al-lahi waliyaʿlama al-mu'minīna

waliyaʿlama alladhīna nāfaqū waqīla lahum taʿālaw qātilū fī sabīli al-lahi awi id'faʿū qālū law naʿlamu qitālan la-ittabaʿnākum hum lil'kuf'ri yawma-idhin aqrabu min'hum lil'īmāni yaqūlūna bi-afwāhihim mā laysa fī qulūbihim wal-lahu aʿlamu bimā yaktumūna
alladhīna qālū li-ikh'wānihim waqaʿadū law aṭāʿūnā mā qutilū qul fa-id'raū ʿan anfusikumu al-mawta in kuntum ṣādiqīna
walā taḥsabanna alladhīna qutilū fī sabīli al-lahi amwātan bal aḥyāon ʿinda rabbihim yur'zaqūna
fariḥīna bimā ātāhumu al-lahu min faḍlihi wayastabshirūna bi-alladhīna lam yalḥaqū bihim min khalfihim allā khawfun ʿalayhim walā hum yaḥzanūna
yastabshirūna biniʿ'matin mina al-lahi wafaḍlin wa-anna al-laha lā yuḍīʿu ajra al-mu'minīna
alladhīna is'tajābū lillahi wal-rasūli min baʿdi mā aṣābahumu al-qarḥu lilladhīna aḥsanū min'hum wa-ittaqaw ajrun ʿaẓīmun
alladhīna qāla lahumu al-nāsu inna al-nāsa qad jamaʿū lakum fa-ikh'shawhum fazādahum īmānan waqālū ḥasbunā al-lahu waniʿ'ma al-wakīlu
fa-inqalabū biniʿ'matin mina al-lahi wafaḍlin lam yamsashum sūon wa-ittabaʿū riḍ'wāna al-lahi wal-lahu dhū faḍlin ʿaẓīmin
innamā dhālikumu al-shayṭānu yukhawwifu awliyāahu falā takhāfūhum wakhāfūni in kuntum mu'minīna
walā yaḥzunka alladhīna yusāriʿūna fī al-kuf'ri innahum lan yaḍurrū al-laha shayan yurīdu al-lahu allā yajʿala lahum ḥaẓẓan fī al-ākhirati walahum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
inna alladhīna ish'tarawū al-kuf'ra bil-īmāni lan yaḍurrū al-laha shayan walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
walā yaḥsabanna alladhīna kafarū annamā num'lī lahum khayrun li-anfusihim innamā num'lī lahum liyazdādū ith'man walahum ʿadhābun muhīnun

mā kāna al-lahu liyadhara al-mu'minīna ʿalā mā antum ʿalayhi ḥattā yamīza al-khabītha mina al-ṭayibi wamā kāna al-lahu liyuṭ'liʿakum ʿalā al-ghaybi walākinna al-laha yajtabī min rusulihi man yashāu faāminū bil-lahi warusulihi wa-in tu'minū watattaqū falakum ajrun ʿaẓīmun

walā yaḥsabanna alladhīna yabkhalūna bimā ātāhumu al-lahu min faḍlihi huwa khayran lahum bal huwa sharrun lahum sayuṭawwaqūna mā bakhilū bihi yawma al-qiyāmati walillahi mīrāthu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-lahu bimā taʿmalūna khabīrun
laqad samiʿa al-lahu qawla alladhīna qālū inna al-laha faqīrun wanaḥnu aghniyāu sanaktubu mā qālū waqatlahumu al-anbiyāa bighayri ḥaqqin wanaqūlu dhūqū ʿadhāba al-ḥarīqi
dhālika bimā qaddamat aydīkum wa-anna al-laha laysa biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi

alladhīna qālū inna al-laha ʿahida ilaynā allā nu'mina lirasūlin ḥattā yatiyanā biqur'bānin takuluhu al-nāru qul qad jāakum rusulun min qablī bil-bayināti wabi-alladhī qul'tum falima qataltumūhum in kuntum ṣādiqīna
fa-in kadhabūka faqad kudhiba rusulun min qablika jāū bil-bayināti wal-zuburi wal-kitābi al-munīri
kullu nafsin dhāiqatu al-mawti wa-innamā tuwaffawna ujūrakum yawma al-qiyāmati faman zuḥ'ziḥa ʿani al-nāri wa-ud'khila al-janata faqad fāza wamā al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā illā matāʿu al-ghurūri
latub'lawunna fī amwālikum wa-anfusikum walatasmaʿunna mina alladhīna ūtū al-kitāba min qablikum wamina alladhīna ashrakū adhan kathīran wa-in taṣbirū watattaqū fa-inna dhālika min ʿazmi al-umūri
wa-idh akhadha al-lahu mīthāqa alladhīna ūtū al-kitāba latubayyinunnahu lilnnāsi walā taktumūnahu fanabadhūhu warāa ẓuhūrihim wa-ish'taraw bihi thamanan qalīlan fabi'sa mā yashtarūna
lā taḥsabanna alladhīna yafraḥūna bimā ataw wayuḥibbūna an yuḥ'madū bimā lam yafʿalū falā taḥsabannahum bimafāzatin mina al-ʿadhābi walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
inna fī khalqi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-ikh'tilāfi al-layli wal-nahāri laāyātin li-ulī al-albābi
alladhīna yadhkurūna al-laha qiyāman waquʿūdan waʿalā junūbihim wayatafakkarūna fī khalqi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi rabbanā mā khalaqta hādhā bāṭilan sub'ḥānaka faqinā ʿadhāba al-nāri
rabbanā innaka man tud'khili al-nāra faqad akhzaytahu wamā lilẓẓālimīna min anṣārin
rabbanā innanā samiʿ'nā munādiyan yunādī lil'īmāni an āminū birabbikum faāmannā rabbanā fa-igh'fir lanā dhunūbanā wakaffir ʿannā sayyiātinā watawaffanā maʿa al-abrāri
rabbanā waātinā mā waʿadttanā ʿalā rusulika walā tukh'zinā yawma al-qiyāmati innaka lā tukh'lifu al-mīʿāda

fa-is'tajāba lahum rabbuhum annī lā uḍīʿu ʿamala ʿāmilin minkum min dhakarin aw unthā baʿḍukum min baʿḍin fa-alladhīna hājarū wa-ukh'rijū min diyārihim waūdhū fī sabīlī waqātalū waqutilū la-ukaffiranna ʿanhum sayyiātihim wala-ud'khilannahum jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru thawāban min ʿindi al-lahi wal-lahu ʿindahu ḥus'nu al-thawābi
lā yaghurrannaka taqallubu alladhīna kafarū fī al-bilādi
matāʿun qalīlun thumma mawāhum jahannamu wabi'sa al-mihādu
lākini alladhīna ittaqaw rabbahum lahum jannātun tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā nuzulan min ʿindi al-lahi wamā ʿinda al-lahi khayrun lil'abrāri

wa-inna min ahli al-kitābi laman yu'minu bil-lahi wamā unzila ilaykum wamā unzila ilayhim khāshiʿīna lillahi lā yashtarūna biāyāti al-lahi thamanan qalīlan ulāika lahum ajruhum ʿinda rabbihim inna al-laha sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū iṣ'birū waṣābirū warābiṭū wa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
